interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bicrops Professional Haircutting Shears Kit, Stainless Steel Beard Hairdressing Scissors Set, Regular Hair Shear, Thinning Scissor, Leather Case. Home Hair Salon For Men And Women
Review Date: 2021/03/04
Store: Bicrops
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Material': 'Stainless Steel, Leather', 'Brand': 'Bicrops', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Style': 'Classic', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '9.61 x 4.53 x 1.34 inches; 12.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '779324784056', 'Manufacturer': 'Bicrops'}
Review Text: First of all this case is nice and worth the listed price on it's own! I have like 15 pairs of scissors and they're all dull so I figured I'd give these a try! I'm soo glad I did, I have nothing I dislike or don't love and I always have something I dislike usually lol. These have cute little blue gems and are really sharp and do a great job they're comfortable for my little hands and my chubby fingers! So excited to use them at work tommorrow!!! They have a nice weight to them I would expect to pay like $50+ for these atleast so I am blown away. I'm so glad I chose these!!
Review Title: Good buy- Licensed pro going on 11 years!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use
Keiby Citom
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'}
As a licensed Cosmetologist I've used ALOT of files and this shape is the best for when I so nail enhancements because I can get into the cuticle area and ensure it is smooth perfectly with the round side and then the straight side is good for filing the sides and shaping the nails! These are good quality and exactly as I expected!!
Best shape for nail files!!

All nail tips are the same just make sure you blend the seam And remove the shine too. Get the job done and come in bulk so they're perfect for me!
Medium depth nail well, No issues, good buy- Cosmetologist

FASHION LINE
{'Brand': 'FASHION LINE', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Clip-In', 'Package Dimensions': '14.22 x 4.89 x 0.91 inches; 6.88 Ounces', 'UPC': '193499624007'}

Love these so cute
lootaan 500 Pieces False Nails French Acrylic Fake Nails Tips Half Cover Artificial Fake Nails With Box and False Nail Clipper for Women Girl
lootaan
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'lootaan', 'Number of Pieces': '500', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '710157699223'}
Sturdy tips on the thicker side but not obnoxiously thick they're perfect! I'm a nail tech (Licensed) and have used MANY different nail tips in my lifetime and never have I ever had a nail container have an actual slot for nail glue to be stored with them!! This is so smart and all of them should be like this! I will keep this container long after the tips are all used up lol!!
10 stars!!! Sturdy not bulky tips, CONTAINER HAS SLOT FOR GLUE TO BE STORED!!
Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure
pine

These colors are so much more vibrant than they look online for sure! They are just like breathtaking the shimmer in them is so  pretty I absolutely adore these polishes I cannot wait to get to use them on my nails and in the salon! I was surprised they were so bright when I opened the bottles! It also came with instructions too if you've never used gel polish too! Just make sure you have a UV lamp to cure these (=
SO PRETTY AND SUPER VIBRANT

{'Color': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'YOLIFE', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.75 x 2 x 0.3 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
This is some work I did with the brushes! The acrylic brush is perfect for doing french tips with acrylic and the brushes are perfect for art. I have a ton of art brushes I use as you can see and these ones are not only the cutest but the best quality. All my brushes are from amazon and very in price but these are so much nicer! A must have for holidays (= We need good quality tools like these for good nails!!

profile:
User Summary:

- **Passion for Nail Art, Hair, and Beauty**: The user is a licensed technician with a strong affinity for nail art and an increasing interest in hair extensions and beauty aesthetics. They thrive on discovering vibrant and innovative products that enable their creative expression.

- **Commitment to Quality**: Their emphasis on purchasing high-quality tools and materials is consistently evident. The user’s reviews reflect a discerning taste for superior performance, design, and exceptional value, often expressing delight in finding products that not only meet but exceed their expectations.

- **Size and Shape Preference**: They value tools with flexible dimensions to aid in their meticulous approach to beauty enhancements. Feedback shows a strong inclination towards instruments that enable precise and creative applications.

- **Performance and Versatility**: Performance remains a critical factor in their decision-making. The user seeks versatile tools that accommodate both routine tasks and innovative challenges, aligning with their ongoing exploration of a wide range of supplies.

- **Positive Experiences**: Recent purchases have reinforced their enthusiasm, showcasing tools that combine functionality with aesthetic appeal. Their latest acquisition, characterized by stylish design and sharpness, highlights their appreciation for effective, comfortable tools at an impressive value. They consistently rate affordable yet high-performing products highly, emphasizing their quest to enhance beauty experiences through superior tools.

Overall, the user is a discerning and enthusiastic beauty professional committed to quality, innovation, and versatility to elevate their creativity and professional results.
